Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Number/max
Synopsis Determine the largest of two numeric values.
Function &T <: num max(&T <: num n, &T <: num m)
Description The largest of two numbers. The type of the result is the same as the type of the largest argument.
Examples 
rascal>import Number;
ok
rascal>max(12, 13);
int: 13
rascal>max(12, 13.5);
num: 13.5
rascal>max(12, 11.5);
num: 12
Questions
Question 1.
The type of max(2, 0) is

Question 2.
The type of max(2, -17.052877303190525600) is

Question 3. 
max(18.60322068107938800, 1) ==

Question 4. 
max(14.09848179451372800, ) == 25.09848179451372800

Question 5. 
max(16.5841241458333200, ) == 16.5841241458333200
